CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Qualified'), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Went_to_Qualified_Date__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Trial'), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Went_to_Trial_Date__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Proposal'), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Went_to_Proposal_Date__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Decision'), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Went_to_Decision_Date__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Purchase'), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Went_to_Purchase_Date__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closing'), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Went_to_Closing_Date__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Ready to Ship'), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Orders Processing'), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Went_to_Orders_Processing_Date__c), null))))))))
CustomField.label: Stage Duration Custom
